concept.title: Audit Log
concept.shortdesc: See how has been accessed and used by viewing the Audit Log.

conbody.p: The log tracks all accesses to : through the or through the .

maintains complete a complete audit log of system and user operations. Log entries include all create, modify, and delete operations performed through the , along with a record of all data access queries made to the system through the PHEMI . Audit Log files are completely tamperproof for all users.
